jobDescription: -Looking for a rockstar intern for an amazing team that not only thrives on technology but also drives social good at a global level.  -Looking for someone who is not afraid to dip their hands in various aspects of an organization and loves to learn and grow  -Projects will include but not limited to utilizing technology for productivity, data cleanup, marketing projects, spreadsheets etc etc.  -This organization is committed to make this world a better place to live, you can make a difference right now, come and join this amazing group and organization  -The internship will be for 6 months 40hrs a week in San Francisco with the possibility of getting extended.
